text: The 1993 Country Music Association Awards, 27th Ceremony, was held on September 29, 1993 at the Grand Ole Opry House, Nashville, Tennessee, and was hosted by CMA Award Winners, Clint Black and Vince Gill. == Winners and Nominees == Winner are in Bold. {| class="wikitable" ! style="background:#EEDD85; width=50%" |Entertainer of the Year ! style="background:#EEDD85; width=50%" |Album of the Year |- | valign="top" | * Vince Gill ** Brooks & Dunn ** Garth Brooks ** Alan Jackson ** Reba McEntire | valign="top" | * I Still Believe in You - Vince Gill ** A Lot About Livin' (And a Little 'bout Love) - Alan Jackson ** Come On Come On - Mary Chapin Carpenter ** Hard Workin' Man - Brooks & Dunn ** The Chase - Garth Brooks |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%" |Male Vocalist of the Year ! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%" |Female Vocalist of the Year |- | valign="top" | * Vince Gill ** John Anderson ** Garth Brooks ** Alan Jackson ** George Strait | valign="top" | * Mary Chapin Carpenter ** Reba McEntire ** Pam Tillis ** Tanya Tucker ** Wynonna |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%" |Vocal Group of the Year ! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%" |Vocal Duo of the Year |- | valign="top" | * Diamond Rio ** Alabama ** Confederate Railroad ** Restless Heart ** Sawyer Brown | valign="top" | * Brooks & Dunn ** Bellamy Brothers ** Darryl & Don Ellis ** Sweetheart of the Rodeo |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%" |Single of the Year ! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%" |Song of the Year |- | valign="top" | * "Chattahoochee" - Alan Jackson ** "Ain't That Lonely Yet" - Dwight Yoakam ** "Don't Let Our Love Start Slippin' Away" - Vince Gill ** "I Don't Need Your Rockin' Chair" - George Jones ** "Two Sparrows in a Hurricane" - Tanya Tucker | valign="top" | * "I Still Believe in You" - Vince Gill and John Barlow Jarvis ** "Ain't That Lonely Yet" - James House and Kostas ** "Boot Scootin' Boogie" - Ronnie Dunn ** "Chattahoochee" - Alan Jackson and Jim McBride ** "Seminole Wind" - John Anderson |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%" |Horizon Award ! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%" |Musician of the Year |- | valign="top" | * Mark Chesnutt ** Sammy Kershaw ** Tracy Lawrence ** John Michael Montgomery ** Trisha Yearwood | valign="top" | * Mark O'Connor ** John Barlow Jarvis ** Paul Franklin ** Brent Mason ** Matt Rollings |- ! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%" |Music Video of the Year ! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%" |Vocal Event of the Year |- | valign="top" | * Chattahoochee - Alan Jackson ** Cleopatra, Queen of Denial - Pam Tillis ** Don't Let Our Love Start Slippin' Away - Vince Gill ** I Don't Need Your Rockin' Chair - George Jones ** Seminole Wind - John Anderson | valign="top" | * I Don't Need Your Rockin' Chair - George Jones with Various Artists ** A Bad Goodbye - Clint Black and Wynonna ** Tell Me About It - Tanya Tucker and Delbert McClinton ** The Heart Won't Lie - Reba McEntire and Vince Gill ** Walkaway Joe - Trisha Yearwood and Don Henley |} == Hall of Fame == {| class="wikitable" ! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%" |Country Music Hall of Fame Inductees |- | valign="top" | * Willie Nelson |} == References == Category:Country music awards Country Music Association Category:American country music CMA Country Music Association Awards Category:Country Music Association Awards Category:September 1993 events in the United States
title: 1993 Country Music Association Awards
